cards.title: Quadratic Expressions and Completing the Square
details: Expand and simplify quadratic expressions
Complete the square for quadratic expressions
Interpret the vertex form and use it to find the vertex of a parabola

cards.title: Quadratic Equations and Roots
details: Solve quadratic equations by factorising, completing the square, and using the quadratic formula
Use the discriminant to determine the nature of the roots
Interpret the meaning of real, repeated, and complex roots

cards.title: Quadratic Inequalities and Applications
details: Solve quadratic inequalities in one variable
Recognise and solve equations that are quadratic in a function of x (e.g., x^4 - 5x^2 + 4 = 0)
Solve simultaneous equations involving one linear and one quadratic equation

cards.title: Function Basics and Domain & Range
details: Understand and use the terms: function, domain, and range
Identify the range of a function in simple cases

cards.title: Composite and Inverse Functions
details: Form and use composite functions, including necessary conditions
Determine if a function is one-one and find the inverse of a one-one function
Represent graphically the relationship between a function and its inverse

cards.title: Function Transformations
details: Describe and apply transformations of the form y = f(x) + a, y = f(x + a), y = af(x), and y = f(ax)
Interpret graphical transformations including translation, reflection, and stretch
Combine simple transformations and describe their effects on the graph

cards.title: Equations and Properties of Straight Lines
details: Find the equation of a straight line from points or gradient
Use and interpret forms: y = mx + c, y - y1 = m(x - x1), ax + by + c = 0
Calculate and interpret gradient, distance, midpoint, and relationships of parallel and perpendicular lines

cards.title: Circles and their Properties
details: Understand and use the standard and expanded forms of a circle equation
Find the center and radius from an equation
Determine intersections of lines and circles and properties of tangency

cards.title: Graphs and Intersection Applications
details: Relate algebraic equations to graphs in the coordinate plane
Use intersections of graphs to solve equations and inequalities
Explore parameter changes and their effects on intersections

cards.title: Radian Measure and Conversions
details: Understand the definition of a radian
Convert between degrees and radians

cards.title: Arc Length and Sector Area
details: Use and apply s = rθ for arc length
Use and apply A = (1/2) r^2 θ for the area of a sector
Apply these formulas to solve practical length and area problems

cards.title: Graphs and Values of Trigonometric Functions
details: Sketch and interpret the graphs of sine, cosine, and tangent for all angles
Recall and use exact values for key angles (30°, 45°, 60°, etc.)

cards.title: Trigonometric Identities and Equations
details: Use identities such as tanθ = sinθ/cosθ and sin^2θ + cos^2θ = 1
Manipulate and prove basic trigonometric identities
Solve trigonometric equations for all solutions in a given interval

cards.title: Inverse Trigonometric Functions
details: Understand and use notations sin^(-1)x, cos^(-1)x, tan^(-1)x for principal values
Interpret and solve equations involving inverse trigonometric functions

cards.title: Binomial Expansions
details: Expand (a + b)^n for positive integer n using binomial coefficients
Understand and use factorial notation in expansions

cards.title: Arithmetic and Geometric Progressions
details: Recognise arithmetic and geometric progressions
Use formulas for the nth term and the sum of the first n terms for arithmetic and geometric sequences
Apply these to sequence and series problems

cards.title: Convergence and Summation
details: Understand conditions for convergence of geometric progressions
Use the formula for the sum to infinity of a convergent geometric progression

cards.title: Basics of Differentiation
details: Interpret the gradient of a curve at a point as a limit
Use notations for first and second derivatives

cards.title: Differentiation Techniques
details: Differentiate x^n for any rational n, including constant multiples, sums, and differences
Apply the chain rule for composite functions

cards.title: Applications of Differentiation
details: Find gradients, equations of tangents and normals
Determine increasing/decreasing intervals and stationary points
Classify stationary points using the second derivative and sketch curves
Solve connected rates of change problems

cards.title: Basics of Integration
details: Understand integration as the reverse process of differentiation
Integrate (ax + b)^n for n ≠ -1, including constant multiples, sums, and differences

cards.title: Indefinite and Definite Integrals
details: Solve for the constant of integration given a point on the curve
Evaluate definite integrals, including simple improper integrals

cards.title: Applications of Integration
details: Calculate area under a curve and between curves using definite integrals
Find the area between a curve and a straight line
Compute volumes of revolution about the axes
